newsitem.title: TURKEY: Bosphorus closed to two-way traffic on Friday.
newsitem.headline: Bosphorus closed to two-way traffic on Friday.

text.p: Istanbul's Bosphorus Strait will be closed to two-way sea traffic between 2:00 and 5:00 p.m. (1100-1400 GMT) on Friday due to Turkish national holiday celebrations, maritime officials said.
They said navy ships would hold a parade on the Straits during that time to mark the 74th anniversary of the Turkish Victory day.
